Package kabasuji.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardView
    BoardView component; all displaying of board elements are here.
    BullpenView
    BullpenView, all bullpen related activities are displayed here.
    ErrorDialogBox
    Error Box Display for User Interaction.
    JLabelIcon
    JLabelIcon; an image object for easy displaying and scaling of images.
    LevelSelectPanel  
    MainMenu
    Main Menu navigation screen; offers navigation to SelectLevelPanel.
    PieceView
    PieceView class for showing tiles inside of pieces.
    PlayLevelPanel
    Main Gameplay window; all games happen here regardless of type.
    SplashWindow
    SplashWindow for Opening Screen.
    TopLevelApplication
    Top level GUI class; acts as the container of all gui elements.
    ZoomPanel
    ZoomPanel; to display enlarged PieceView.
